Description: measurement date - around 11 days old , when nesltling body mass is recorded
individual fledgling identity - four letter code
identity of pied babbler group - three letter code
identity of breeding season - single letter code, represents the time period September to March
nestling age in days on the measurement day - age since hatching
male or female, determined by molecular sexing from blood samples taken on the measurement day

Identity of the nest in which the nestling was raised - equivalent to the brood identity. Code = Group ID, N for nest, number - for number of nest with 1 being the first clutch laid and incubated in the season, season ID
Number of adult group members including both members of the dominant pair and all subordinate group members older than 1 year
Total number of group members including birds less than one year old
Number of consecutive seasons that the same two birds have made the dominant pair at the group
Number of nestlings in the brood on the measurement day
Number of nestlings in the brood on the measurement day that were male
ratio of male to female nestlings in the brood
nestling mass measured to 0.1g on the measurement day (Date)
Whether or not the nestling survived to nutritional independence at 90 days of age where 0 = died, 1 = survived
Number of days the individual survived, maximum is 90 days at which age they have achieved nutritional independence
mass measured to 0.1g within 15 days either side of the individual reaching 90 days of age, where available
whether or not the individual survived to 1 year of age, where 0 = died, 1 = survived
mass measured to 0.1g within 15 days either side of the individual reaching 1 year of age, where available
Mean daily maximum air temperature between start of incubation and hatching
Mean daily maximum air temperature between start of hatching and fledging
Mean daily maximum air temperature between fledging and nutritional independence at 90 days or death
Mean daily minimum air temperature between start of incubation and hatching
Mean daily minimum air temperature between start of hatching and fledging
Mean daily minimum air temperature between fledging and nutritional independence at 90 days or death
Mean daily air temperature variation (maximum - minimum) between start of incubation and hatching
Mean daily air temperature variation (maximum - minimum) between start of hatching and fledging
Mean daily air temperature variation (maximum-minimum) between fledging and nutritional independence at 90 days or death
number of heat waves (three or more consecutive days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C) between start of incubation and hatching
number of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between start of incubation and hatching
proportion of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between start of incubation and hatching
number of heat waves (three or more consecutive days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C) between hatching and fledging
number of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between hatching and fledging
proportion of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between hatching and fledging
number of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between fledging and nutritional independence at 90 days or death
proportion of days with maximum air temperature equal to or exceeding 35.5 degrees C between fledging nutritional independence at 90 days or death
Total rainfall in the 60 days prior to the start of incubation
Total rainfall between fledging and nutritional independence
Whether or not the breeding seasn (Sept-Mar) was classifed at a drought (rainfall <=137mm), where 0 = no drought, 1 = drought
